original_text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men: they make broad their phylacteries, and enlarge the borders of their garments,
korean_text: 그들의 모든 행위를 사람에게 보이고자 하나니 곧 그 경문 띠를 넓게 하며 옷술을 길게 하고

sentences.original_text: But all their works they do
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 그들의 모든 행위를 행하나니

sentences.original_text: for to be seen of men:
and enlarge the borders of their garments,
